data.meanings: to frown, look sternly, austere, grim.
data.sentence: The word عَبَسَ comes from the root ع ب س and is associated with the meanings: to frown, look sternly, austere, grim.

data.meanings: frown, contract one's face, grinned, looking morosely/sternly, look with intense dislike/hatred, scowl.
data.sentence: The word وَبَسَرَ comes from the root ب س ر and is associated with the meanings: frown, contract one's face, grinned, looking morosely/sternly, look with intense dislike/hatred, scowl.
